casebody.data:
PATRONELLI
v.
PATRONELLI. No. 55A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 23, 2006. Michael S. Harrell, Raleigh, for Carrie Patronelli. John M. Oliver, for Donald J. Patronelli. John I. Mabe, Jr., Raleigh, for NC Bar Association. William D. Rowe, for N.C. Justice Center. Kenneth L. Schorr, Charlotte, for LSSP. Andrea Kurtz, for LAS. Christine O. Trottier, for CLA. Stella A. Boswell, for NCAWA.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd day of August 2006 by Amici for Leave to Present Oral Argument:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of August 2006."
